text:
Created attachment 33871
Conatains MS Word file demonstrating the issue raised

Trying to set Outer borer colour but not getting exact colours. Colours of outer and inner border colours are different as seen in the attachments. Need same colour for outer border as inner.

Also Width of table cannot be set. In print layout mode. Table cannot be seen completely. Also shown in attachments
